data.expected_result: The Server Settings panel should close
data.short_description: Pressing ESC as you're loading the Audit Log section of Server Settings causes the client to crash
data.steps_to_repro: - Have the View Audit Log permission in a server - Right-click on the server's icon and go directly to the Audit Log section - Press the ESC key as soon as the Server Settings frame appears (timing specific, so give it a few tries)
